name: Twisted (itch) (Gwat Studios)
description:
Play differently!

Twisted is a project that shows how some games would be if they had  some features changed.

What If
  • You control the obstacles?
  • You can't move foward?
  • You place the food?
  • You are a ghost?
Credits
  • Developer - Jorge Pires
  • Engine - Unity 2021
